page.title: I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (U.S. TV series)

revisions.rev:
'''''I'm a Celebrity...Get Me out of Here!''''' (often referred to as '''''I'm a Celebrity''''') is an [[United States|American]] [[reality television|reality]] [[television series]] based on the [[I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (UK TV series)|British television show of the same name]], in which celebrities live in jungle conditions with few comforts.
The series is produced by [[ITV]], Independent Television, a British company, and was picked up from [[American Broadcasting Company|ABC]], which aired in early 2003. The new series, shown on NBC, ran for 14 episodes, and followed the same format as the [[United Kingdom|UK]] [[I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!|version]] of the same show. On March 8, 2010, NBC announced that there would not be a third season.<ref>http://www.thefutoncritic.com/news.aspx?date=03/08/10&id=8562</ref>
<ref name="Hibberd">{{cite news |title=NBC's summer schedule revealed: 'Philanthropist,' 'Merlin,' 'Celebrity,' Conan and more |first=James |last=Hibberd |work=The Live Feed |date=March 12, 2009 |url=http://www.thrfeed.com/2009/03/nbcs-summer-schedule.html }}</ref>
